title: VACAVA Inc. Announces Presentation Highlighting How to Incr
text:
ROCHESTER, Minn. , Oct. VACAVA Inc., an expert in processing reengineering is announcing a poster presentation highlighting 'Clinical laboratory centralized licensure and accreditation management â€“ How to increase efficiency and quality' led by Hether Seifert BS, MSM, CCRP of the Mayo Clinic at the American Society for Clinical Pathology (ASCP) annual meeting October 28-30, 2015 in Long Beach, CA. The poster presentation explains the challenges of laboratory certification and accreditation management and a more effective process. Developed by Hether Seifert , the hypothesis states that centralized laboratory licensure and accreditation can be managed more effectively and efficiently with centralized online records, changing the manner by which laboratories manage data collection, approvals and submissions.
In collaboration with VACAVA, a new lab certification management software application was developed to simplify data collection, management and access. This cloud-based implementation enables remote data entry in a real-time sharing environment with features such as certification renewal notifications, compliance reports and profile management. It also has the ability to archive certificates and prepopulate certification and accreditation forms.
This lab certification software application is now available to healthcare organizations of all sizes. LabRight Certification by VACAVA, Inc. is a tool for lab professionals, enabling greater efficiency and lower cost management of lab certifications and accreditations.
"With Hether Seifert, BS, MSM, CCRP, Mayo Clinic, we are grateful for the opportunity to share our collaboration at this year's American Society for Clinical Pathology (ASCP) annual meeting," said Terry Bird , Founder and Managing Partner at VACAVA. The ASCP is the world's largest professional membership organization for pathologists and laboratory professionals. "We hope stimulating discussions at the conference will spark future collaborations benefiting other healthcare organizations."
About LabRight Certification
LabRight Certification was designed for busy lab professionals, automating lab certification and accreditation management by increasing the efficiency and lowering the cost of operations. LabRight Certification stores lab profiles, monitors renewal dates, allows for efficient internal auditing with easy-to-read reports, as well as creates certification and accreditation renewal forms for users. Learn more about LabRight by VACAVA at www.vacava.com/labright .
